Name: Eliminate Drips - 消灭水滴
About the game: This is an independent game that allows players to relieve stress in thinking about decryption. When you are tired of all kinds of brutal and murderous sensory games, you might as well try to relax. You can click on the droplets as much as you like until you wipe them out. Of course, in addition to venting clicks, you can also try to explore the rules. The water droplets will disappear after clicking, but if there are vacancies around it, it will turn into new droplets. Only when you fully use your brain can you Eliminate the small water droplets clean.
